author: sanders
msg: Added the ability to pass the Digester instance on to the factory.
This is to allow for classloading, debugging, checking parser props, etc.

msg: When setRules() is called, call setDigester() on it so that it knows which

author: craigmcc
msg: More decoupling of Digester from its legacy of being part of Struts.
